question: Which union ministry is hosting the 13th executive committee meeting of International Smart Grid Action Network (ISGAN)?
option1: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
option4: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
explanation: The Ministry of Power is hosting the 13th Executive Committee (ExCo) Meeting of the International Smart Grid Action Network (ISGAN) at powergrid corporate center in Gurugram, Haryana from March 6, 2017. This is the first-ever ISGAN ExCo Meeting in India.  In the 3-day event, a total of 36 representatives from 18 countries viz. Germany, Korea, Norway, Russia, South Africa, US and UAE, etc., has participated. The purpose of the meeting is to improve the understanding of smart grid technologies, practices and promote adoption of related enabling government policies.
